entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming east 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
